lead: The robotics landscape is rapidly evolving, with significant advancements in AI integration and automation across various industries. From manufacturing to personal assistance, robots are becoming essential partners in business operations.

stories.title: The Rise of Physical AI: When Robots Become Business Partners
stories.summary: As Japan faces labor shortages, the concept of 'Physical AI' is emerging, where AI-powered robots transition from simple tools to essential business partners. Companies like Iris Ohyama are leading the charge in deploying AI-enabled robotics across sectors such as manufacturing and healthcare, emphasizing their role in enhancing productivity and competitiveness.

stories.title: Tesla discontinuing Model S and Model X to make room for robots
stories.summary: In a bold move, Tesla is discontinuing its Model S and Model X vehicles to prioritize the production of its Optimus humanoid robot. This decision marks a significant shift in Tesla's strategy, aiming to transform the company from a traditional automaker into a leader in AI and robotics.

stories.title: Tesla profit tanked 46% in 2025
stories.summary: Tesla's financial struggles continue as it reports a 46% drop in profit for 2025, attributed to declining sales and increased focus on AI and robotics initiatives. The company's substantial investment in AI technologies reflects its commitment to pivoting towards a future dominated by automation.

stories.title: Tesla hits a grim milestone: its second straight year of decline
stories.summary: Tesla has reported its second consecutive year of declining revenue and profits, complicating its ambitious plans to lead in AI and robotics. Despite these setbacks, the global electric vehicle market continues to grow, highlighting the challenges Tesla faces in its transformation.

stories.title: AI-Driven Strategy: Balancing Governance and Flexibility
stories.summary: As AI becomes integral to business models, organizations are focusing on governance and flexibility in AI deployment. This balance is crucial for enhancing productivity while ensuring ethical use, as companies redefine their IT strategies to incorporate AI agents and robotics.

stories.title: From 'AI Agents' to 'AI Partners'
stories.summary: The shift from AI agents to AI partners signifies a new era in human-AI collaboration. Companies are exploring optimal models for integrating AI into their operations, which could lead to significant competitive advantages in various industries.

stories.title: Data Readiness Will Separate Winners from Laggards
stories.summary: As AI adoption accelerates, the quality of data preparation will become a key differentiator for companies. Organizations that invest in robust data governance will be better positioned to leverage AI and robotics effectively in their operations.

stories.title: The AI Agent Revolution: Redefining Manufacturing and Office Work
stories.summary: The integration of AI agents is set to redefine both manufacturing and office work. Companies are focusing on creating platforms that enable employees to harness the full potential of AI, transforming traditional workflows and enhancing productivity.
